brochure.name: Weebo
brochure.description: Transform your business with Weebo - the intelligent appointment scheduling platform built for Asia. Seamless LINE integration, 5-minute setup, powerful analytics.

cta.finePrint: No credit card required • 14-day free trial

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for modern businesses

quickSetup.title: 5-Minute Setup
quickSetup.description: Get started instantly with our intuitive setup wizard. No technical knowledge required.

qrCodes.title: Smart QR Codes
qrCodes.description: Generate custom QR codes for contactless booking. Perfect for physical locations.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track bookings, revenue, and customer behavior with beautiful dashboards.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Automated scheduling with conflict prevention and capacity management.

customForms.title: Custom Forms
customForms.description: Build beautiful booking forms with our drag-and-drop form builder.

autoReminders.title: Auto Reminders
autoReminders.description: Reduce no-shows with automated LINE reminders sent at the perfect time.

analyticsPreview.title: Powerful Analytics
analyticsPreview.description: Make data-driven decisions with real-time insights into your business performance.

qrCodeFeature.title: QR Code Magic
qrCodeFeature.description: Generate beautiful, scannable QR codes that your customers can use to book instantly.

featureShowcase.title: Powerful Features in Action
featureShowcase.subtitle: See how Weebo's advanced features help you run your business better

feature1.title: Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard
feature1.description: Get complete visibility into your business performance with real-time analytics. Track bookings, revenue trends, staff productivity, and customer insights through beautiful, actionable dashboards that help you make data-driven decisions.

feature2.title: Intuitive Appointment Management
feature2.description: View and manage all your appointments in one streamlined interface. Quickly navigate your schedule, update booking details, and handle customer requests with an appointment management system designed for efficiency.

feature3.title: Daily Overview at a Glance
feature3.description: Start each day with a clear picture of what's ahead. Your dashboard instantly shows today's agenda, upcoming appointments, key metrics, and performance indicators—everything you need to stay on top of your business.

feature4.title: Advanced Appointment Controls
feature4.description: Take full control of your scheduling with a rich, intuitive interface. Easily create, modify, and reschedule appointments with drag-and-drop functionality, visual time slots, and instant conflict detection.

feature5.title: Seamless LINE Bot Integration
feature5.description: Connect with customers on their preferred platform. Use your own LINE bot or leverage the Weebo bot to automate appointment confirmations, send reminders, and facilitate instant communication with your customers.

feature6.title: Flexible Custom Form Builder
feature6.description: Create perfectly tailored booking experiences with our drag-and-drop form builder. Add custom fields, conditional logic, pricing options, and service variants to collect exactly the information you need from customers.

feature7.title: Beautiful Customer Booking Experience
feature7.description: Delight your customers with a modern, mobile-friendly booking interface. Your custom forms provide a seamless experience where customers can easily view services, select time slots, and complete appointments in just a few taps.

screenshots.title: See It In Action
screenshots.subtitle: Discover how Weebo transforms your booking experience

dashboard.title: Intuitive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage all your bookings, customers, and analytics from one beautiful interface.

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: Visual scheduling with drag-and-drop, color coding, and automatic conflict detection.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Design
mobile.description: Beautiful, responsive booking forms that work flawlessly on all devices.

formBuilder.title: Custom Form Builder
formBuilder.description: Drag-and-drop form builder to create the perfect booking experience for your customers.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One plan with everything you need to grow your business

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
finalCta.description: Join hundreds of businesses already using Weebo to streamline their booking process.
finalCta.finePrint: No credit card required • 5 min setup • {trialDays}-day free trial

footer.tagline: The intelligent booking platform built for Asia

metadata.title: Weebo - LINE Booking System | Professional Appointment Scheduling
metadata.description: The intelligent booking platform built for Asia. Connect with 95M+ LINE users, automate scheduling, and grow your business. 14-day free trial, no credit card required.
metadata.descriptionShort: LINE booking system with 5-min setup, automated scheduling, and real-time analytics. Built for Asia's service businesses. 14-day free trial.
metadata.descriptionLong: Weebo is the intelligent appointment scheduling platform designed for Asia. Seamlessly integrates with LINE to connect with 95M+ users. Perfect for salons, spas, cafes, clinics, and service businesses. Features include QR code booking, automated reminders, real-time analytics, multi-language support, and staff management. 5-minute setup, 14-day free trial, no credit card required. Never miss a booking opportunity with 24/7 availability.
metadata.descriptionFeatures: ✓ Native LINE integration ✓ QR code booking ✓ Automated reminders ✓ Real-time analytics ✓ Multi-language support ✓ 5-minute setup
metadata.descriptionBenefits: Reduce no-shows by 40%, increase customer satisfaction, automate booking workflows, and save time. The LINE-powered booking system designed specifically for Asian small businesses.
metadata.keywords: LINE booking system, appointment scheduling, Asia booking software, LINE integration, business scheduling, Taiwan booking, Japan booking, Thailand booking, QR code booking, contactless booking, small business scheduling, online booking system, salon booking, spa booking, restaurant reservation, automated reminders, real-time analytics, multi-language booking
metadata.ogTitle: Weebo - Transform Your Business with LINE-Powered Booking
metadata.ogDescription: Professional appointment booking system that runs natively on LINE. 5-minute setup, real-time analytics, and 24/7 availability. Start your free trial today.
metadata.ogImageAlt: Weebo booking system interface showing LINE integration and analytics dashboard
metadata.twitterTitle: Weebo | LINE Booking System - 5-Minute Setup for Asian Businesses
metadata.twitterDescription: Native LINE booking system | QR code scanning | Automated reminders | Real-time analytics | Free trial
metadata.schemaDescription: Weebo is a professional appointment booking and management software designed for the Asian market, with deep LINE integration. Features include QR code booking, automated reminders, real-time analytics, and multi-language support. Perfect for hair salons, spas, cafes, clinics, and various service businesses.

metadata.title: Kitsune - Smart Appointment Scheduling for Asia | LINE Integration
metadata.description: Transform your business with Kitsune - the intelligent appointment scheduling platform built for Asia. Seamless LINE integration, 5-minute setup, powerful analytics, and 24/7 booking for salons, spas, cafes, and service businesses.
metadata.keywords: appointment booking, LINE booking system, Asia booking platform, appointment scheduler, salon booking, spa booking, cafe reservations, QR code booking, LINE integration, business scheduling, Japan booking system, Thailand booking, Taiwan booking
metadata.ogTitle: Kitsune - Smart Appointment Scheduling with LINE Integration
metadata.ogDescription: The intelligent booking platform built for Asia. Powered by LINE, designed for simplicity, packed with analytics. Setup in 5 minutes.
metadata.twitterTitle: Kitsune - Smart Appointment Scheduling for Asia
metadata.twitterDescription: Transform your business with LINE-powered booking. 5-minute setup, powerful analytics, 24/7 availability.

errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect LINE account. Please try again.

botId.title: How to Find Your Bot Basic ID
botId.introduction: Your Bot Basic ID is a unique identifier for your LINE Official Account. It's used to create the "Add Friend" link that allows customers to connect with your bot.
botId.step1Description: Open the LINE Developers Console in a new tab
botId.step2Description: Click on the provider that contains your Messaging API channel
botId.step3Description: Choose the channel associated with your business bot
botId.step4Description: Click on the "Messaging API" tab in the navigation
botId.step5Description: Scroll down to find the "Bot basic ID" field. It will look like this:
botId.step6Description: Copy the Bot Basic ID (including the @ symbol) and paste it into the input field
botId.formatDescription: The Bot Basic ID always starts with @ followed by alphanumeric characters.
botId.needHelpDescription: If you're having trouble finding your Bot Basic ID, check out the official LINE documentation:

token.title: How to Get Your Channel Access Token
token.introduction: Your Channel Access Token is a secret key that allows Weebo to send messages through your LINE Official Account. Keep this token secure and never share it publicly.
token.step1Description: Open the LINE Developers Console in a new tab
token.step2Description: Click on the provider that contains your Messaging API channel
token.step3Description: Choose the channel associated with your business bot
token.step4Description: Click on the "Messaging API" tab in the navigation
token.step5Description: Scroll down to the "Channel access token (long-lived)" section and click the "Issue" button if you haven't already
token.step6Description: Click the "Copy" button next to your token. The token is a long string of characters.
token.step7Description: Paste the token into the Channel Access Token field in Weebo
token.securityDescription: This token grants full access to send messages from your LINE Official Account. Never share it publicly or commit it to version control. If you believe your token has been compromised, revoke it immediately in the LINE Developers Console and issue a new one.
token.needHelpDescription: If you're having trouble finding your Channel Access Token, check out the official LINE documentation:
